## Installation

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("RiboRings/miaDash")
```

## Example

```{r start, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(miaDash)

app <- miaDash()

# Launch miaDash
if (interactive()) {
  shiny::runApp(app)
}
```

SCREENSHOT <- function(x, ...) knitr::include_graphics(x)
```

```
